explanation: 该研究论文主要关注平流层环流的动力学分离，特别是Brewer-Dobson环流的深层和浅层分支。它利用再分析数据，分析不同尺度的行星波对环流的驱动作用，并探讨了环流结构的长期趋势。虽然该研究涉及大气成分（痕量气体和气溶胶）的传输，但其重点在于环流的动力学机制，而非大气环境遥感技术本身，例如空气质量监测或卫星观测。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['stratospheric circulation', 'Brewer-Dobson circulation', 'planetary waves', 'reanalysis data', 'trace gas transport', 'aerosol transport']
authors: Rasul Baikhadzhaev;Felix Ploeger;Peter Preusse;Manfred Ern;Thomas Birner
title: A dynamics-based separation of deep and shallow stratospheric circulation branches
abstract:
Across four reanalyses, the shallow branch of the stratospheric overturning circulation was found to be driven by planetary waves 1 to 3, and the deep branch of the circulation was found to be driven by smaller-scale waves (wave 4 and higher). However, the height of the level separating the branches is dependent on the reanalysis considered. Thus, using the appropriate separation levels in model inter-comparisons could reduce the spread between models regarding climatology and trends in the circulation. 
 The wave-driven Brewer–Dobson circulation plays a crucial role in determining the transport of trace gases and aerosols in the stratosphere. We examine the structure of the circulation based on reanalysis data (ERA5, ERA-Interim, MERRA2, and JRA55) and the Transformed Eulerian Mean and downward control framework, aiming for a dynamical separation of different circulation branches in terms of outflow generated by wave driving. The results show the existence of different circulation regimes, with a deep circulation branch mainly driven by planetary waves with wavenumbers 1–3, and a shallow circulation branch mainly driven by smaller-scale waves with wavenumbers greater than 3. We propose a definition of the separation level between shallow and deep branches as the lowest level where outflow from planetary waves is larger than outflow from smaller-scale waves. We show that this level occurs at approximately 22 km (43 hPa) with a weak annual cycle. This climatological structure is robust in various reanalyses. The variability of the circulation in the deep branch above the separation level is mainly related to planetary waves, while the variability in the shallow branch is related to both smaller-scale and planetary waves. Trends in the circulation over the period 1980–2017 show an upward shift of the deep branch related to planetary waves and a downward shift of the shallow branch related to both planetary and smaller-scale waves. The height of the separation level shows no significant trend. Taking into account differences in wave driving between the branches of the circulation could explain the spread in model inter-comparisons.

explanation: 这篇论文的标题和摘要表明其研究重点是城市臭氧污染期间，一氧化二氮（HONO）对氮氧化物（NOx）排放控制的影响。虽然没有直接提及遥感技术，但该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。因为了解大气成分（如HONO和NOx）对于空气质量监测和臭氧污染的控制至关重要。遥感技术，如卫星观测和大气成分分析，可以用于监测这些污染物的浓度和分布，从而为制定有效的排放控制策略提供数据支持。因此，该研究的结果可以为遥感数据的解释和应用提供有价值的信息。
topic_words: ['HONO', 'NOx', 'Ozone Pollution', 'Urban Air Quality', 'Atmospheric Composition']
authors: Zhen Jiang;Meng-Xue Tang;Li He;Jun-Hong Li;Yi Hong;Ling-Yan He;Xiao-Feng Huang
title: Unveiling the HONO Offsetting Effect: Rethinking NOx Emission Controls during Urban Ozone Pollution Episodes

explanation: 该研究论文的标题表明其关注北极地区春夏季有机气溶胶的来源和组成。有机气溶胶是大气中的重要组成部分，对空气质量和气候都有影响。虽然标题没有直接提及遥感技术，但对气溶胶的研究通常会用到遥感技术，例如卫星观测和地面传感器，以监测气溶胶的分布、浓度和性质。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术有一定的相关性，特别是与大气成分分析和空气质量监测有关。
topic_words: ['Organic Aerosols', 'Atmospheric Composition', 'Air Quality', 'Arctic Haze', 'Aerosol Source Tracking']
authors: Benjamin Heutte;Hélène Angot;Gang I. Chen;Jakob B. Pernov;Imad El Haddad;Lubna Dada;Kaspar R. Daellenbach;Ivo Beck;Nora Bergner;Silvia Bucci;Jessie M. Creamean;Markku Kulmala;Tiia Laurila;Tuukka Petäjä;Kerri A. Pratt;André S. H. Prévôt;Lauriane L. J. Quéléver;Paul Zieger;Tuija Jokinen;Julia Schmale
title: Sources and Composition of Organic Aerosols in the Central Arctic during Spring and Summer

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注西印度地区含碳气溶胶的来源和处理过程中的季节性变化。研究方法采用双碳同位素技术。虽然标题中没有明确提及遥感技术，但对含碳气溶胶的研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为气溶胶是大气成分的重要组成部分，并且可以通过卫星观测进行监测。因此，该研究与空气质量监测和大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术领域相关。
topic_words: ['carbonaceous aerosols', 'dual-carbon isotopes', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: M. Devaprasad;N. Rastogi;A. Patel;S. Harithasree;R. Meena;A. Dabhi;A. Shivam;R. Bhushan
title: Unraveling Seasonality in Origin and Processing of Carbonaceous Aerosols over Western India Using Dual-Carbon Isotopes

explanation: 该研究关注非洲生物质燃烧产生的水溶性有机气体排放的化学特征。生物质燃烧是大气污染物的重要来源，其排放物对空气质量和大气成分产生重大影响。因此，这项研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是与空气质量监测和大气成分分析有关。遥感技术可以用于监测生物质燃烧的范围和强度，以及追踪其排放物在大气中的扩散和转化，从而为空气质量预报和气候变化研究提供重要数据。
topic_words: ['biomass burning', 'organic gas emissions', 'air quality', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: Cade M. Christensen;Megan M. McRee;Marc N. Fiddler;Solomon Bililign;Barbara J. Turpin;Jason D. Surratt
title: Chemical Characterization of Primary Water-Soluble Organic Gas Emissions from African Biomass Burning

explanation: 该研究论文关注的是城市郊区交界地带（WUI）由于小型住宅建筑燃烧产生的烟雾中非甲烷有机气体（NMOGs）的释放量。 这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及对空气质量的监测和大气成分的分析，特别是与燃烧排放相关的成分。遥感技术可以用于监测和分析这些烟雾的扩散、成分以及对空气质量的影响。
topic_words: ['air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'nonmethane organic gases', 'combustion emissions', 'WUI smoke']
authors: Michael F. Link;Aika Y. Davis;Nathan M. Lima;Ryan L. Falkenstein-Smith;Rodney A. Bryant;Thomas G. Cleary;Dustin Poppendieck
title: Wildland-Urban Interface (WUI) Smoke Yields of Nonmethane Organic Gases from Combustion of Small-Scale Residential Building Surrogates

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注二乙醚在大气中的自氧化化学反应。虽然大气化学与环境遥感技术相关，但该研究更侧重于特定化合物的化学反应机理，而不是使用遥感技术进行空气质量监测或大气成分分析。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的直接关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['atmospheric chemistry', 'autoxidation', 'diethyl ether', 'air pollution chemistry']
authors: Hongmin Yu;Jing Chen;John D. Crounse;Thomas Golin Almeida;Henrik G. Kjaergaard;Paul O. Wennberg
title: Atmospheric Autoxidation Chemistry of Diethyl Ether

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注北京冬季雾霾的形成和演变。研究方法包括颗粒物粒径分布和气溶胶成分的垂直测量，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是空气质量监测和大气成分分析。虽然没有明确提到卫星或特定传感器，但垂直测量的数据可以与遥感数据结合使用，以更全面地了解雾霾的形成机制和演变过程。
topic_words: ['air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'particle size distribution', 'aerosol composition', 'winter haze', 'vertical measurements']
authors: Yele Sun;Siqi Zeng;Yan Li;Lu Lei;Bin Ouyang;Yanmei Qiu;Conghui Xie;Yuying Wang;Wei Zhou;Weiqi Xu;Guiqian Tang;Zifa Wang
title: Unraveling the Formation and Evolution of Winter Haze in Beijing: Insights from Vertical Measurements of Particle Size Distributions and Aerosol Composition

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注火星弓形激波的统计分析，利用MAVEN探测器的数据研究了弓形激波的摆动现象。虽然涉及到了火星大气，但其重点在于太阳风与火星磁场之间的相互作用，以及等离子体波和离子加速等物理过程。与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
topic_words: ['bow shock', 'magnetometer', 'solar wind', 'plasma waves', 'ion acceleration']
authors: Niklas J. T. Edberg;David J. Andrews;Long Cheng;Konstantin Kim;Katerina Stergiopoulou;Mark Lester;Cyril Simon Wedlund;Jasper S. Halekas;Shannon M. Curry
title: Statistical Analysis of Multiple Bow Shock Crossings at Mars
abstract: We conduct a statistical analysis of multiple bow shock (BS) crossings at Mars. Data from the magnetometer (MAG) and Solar Wind Ion Analyzer (SWIA) onboard the Mars Atmosphere and Volatile Evolution (MAVEN) spacecraft from its first 2 years in orbit is used to identify flapping events. These are interpreted as the bow shock moving toward and away from Mars. 9% of all MAVEN passes occur when the BS is flapping. Such events are more common on the flanks than on the ramside and more common at southern dayside latitudes than in the north. The probability of flapping increases with increased dynamic pressure and decreased Mach number. The distribution of shock velocity and shock jump differ from the single‐BS cases. The shock moves in a swaying motion on the time scale of minutes, and such dynamics could influence other processes at Mars, such as plasma waves, wave‐particle interaction, and ion acceleration.

explanation: 该研究分析了2012-2022年韩国冬季PM2.5及其成分的变化趋势。研究发现，全国PM2.5浓度在气象校正后呈下降趋势，但首尔的PM2.5浓度下降主要发生在2019年后，且成分向硝酸盐颗粒物和有机气溶胶转变。研究表明，随着氮氧化物排放量的减少，臭氧浓度升高，导致夜间硝酸根自由基的生成增加，从而促进了硝酸盐颗粒物和二次有机气溶胶的形成。该研究与大气环境遥感技术相关，因为它涉及空气质量监测，特别是对PM2.5及其成分的分析，这些都可以通过遥感技术进行辅助观测和研究。
topic_words: ['PM2.5', 'particulate nitrate', 'organic aerosol', 'nitrogen dioxide', 'ozone', 'NOx emissions', 'air quality monitoring']
authors: Drew C. Pendergrass;Daniel J. Jacob;Yujin J. Oak;Ruijun Dang;Laura Hyesung Yang;Ellie Beaudry;Nadia K. Colombi;Shixian Zhai;Hwajin Kim;Jin‐soo Choi;Jin‐soo Park;Soontae Kim;Ke Li;Hong Liao
title: Wintertime Trends of Fine Particulate Matter (PM2.5) in South Korea, 2012–2022: Response of Nitrate and Organic Components to Decreasing NOx Emissions
abstract: We analyze 2011–2022 trends in wintertime fine particulate matter (PM2.5) and its composition in South Korea using surface network data and machine learning. PM2.5 decreased nationwide by 1.2 μg m−3 per year after correcting for meteorology. However, Seoul PM2.5 declined only after 2019 and its composition has shifted toward particulate nitrate (pNO3−) and organic aerosol (OA). Trends in pNO3−, OA, nitrogen dioxide (NO2), and ozone (O3) suggest that nighttime formation of the nitrate radical (NO3) from the NO2 + O3 reaction is a key driver of pNO3− and secondary OA (SOA) formation. Increasing O3 as nitrogen oxide (NOx) emissions decline has increased nighttime NO3 production over the 2012–2022 period, promoting pNO3− and SOA formation. As NOx emissions in South Korea continue to decline, transition from NOx‐saturated to NOx‐limited conditions for NO3 formation should lead to rapid decreases in nighttime PM2.5 formation.

explanation: 该研究论文利用国际空间站上的高分辨率相机，通过观测飓风“伊恩”眼壁上方大气中的OH夜辉现象，捕捉到了短水平波长的不稳定性结构。论文结合地球静止业务环境卫星16（GOES-16）的数据，分析了这些对流层特征的高度，并推断大气重力波可能源自飓风眼壁。这项研究利用了空间遥感技术来研究飓风对高层大气的影响，涉及卫星观测、大气重力波等大气现象。
topic_words: ['satellite observations', 'atmospheric gravity waves', 'upper troposphere', 'upper mesosphere', 'hurricane', 'OH nightglow', 'high-spatial resolution camera', 'GOES-16']
authors: J. H. Hecht;D. S. Nolan;L. J. Gelinas;R. L. Walterscheid
title: High‐Spatial Resolution Space‐Based Observations in the Upper Troposphere and Upper Mesosphere of Wavelike Features Produced by Hurricane Ian
abstract: A new high‐spatial resolution camera on the International Space Station used OH nightglow in the H‐band to image the ground at an ∼ ${\sim} $70 m pixel footprint over an ∼ ${\sim} $280 km swath and maintained this resolution during its 1.5 s exposure. Near 0405 UT on 28 September 2022 moon down images obtained over the eyewall of the category 4 Hurricane Ian revealed short‐horizontal wavelength (∼ ${\sim} $5 km) instabilities with even finer scale (∼ ${\sim} $1–2 km) perpendicular structures, similar to those identified in recent modeling. Images taken (∼ ${\sim} $10 s apart) are used to separate these tropospheric features from atmospheric gravity waves (AGWs) imaged at ∼ ${\sim} $87 km. Geostationary Operational Environmental Satellite 16 (GOES‐16) data were used to estimate the altitudes of the tropospheric features. Available auxiliary data were used to show that the AGWs plausibly originated from close to Ian's eyewall 1–2 hr earlier.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注使用超低频麦克风气压计（infrasound microbarometers）探测地球表面的气压波动和声音信号，以揭示地表风速的变化趋势和环境声音的周期性变化。研究重点在于地形驱动的微气象如何影响低于10Hz的日间背景噪声水平，以及交通、通风系统和电力线路等产生的人为噪声的日/周周期性变化。虽然该研究与大气现象有关，但它更侧重于局部地区的风和噪声模式分析，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['infrasound', 'microbarometer', 'micrometeorology', 'anthropogenic noise', 'wind noise']
authors: Amrit K. Malach;Daniel C. Bowman;Sonia Wharton;Reagan S. Turley;Robert L. White;Walter Schalk;the PE1 Experiment Team
title: Cyclic Background Noise Variations on Infrasound Microbarometers From Micrometeorology and Human Activity
abstract: Infrasound microbarometers deployed on the Earth's surface capture pressure fluctuations and acoustic signatures, revealing trends in surface wind speed and cycles in ambient sound. Previous studies investigated wind noise trends at quarter day resolution and urban acoustic background variations on hourly to weekly scales. Cyclic variations at sub‐hourly resolution over local distances remain unaddressed. We show that topography‐driven micrometeorology impacts diurnal background noise levels below 10 Hz. Anthropogenic noise occurs over daily and weekly cycles, with inputs from traffic, ventilation systems, and power lines. These noise patterns vary at stations spaced less than a kilometer apart. We observe these phenomena by using a circular spectrogram to visualize frequency trends over a periodic temporal scale. This study demonstrates that infrasound microbarometer deployments can highlight localized wind patterns and time scales of human activity. The results suggest that future microbarometer deployments may benefit from site noise surveys before selecting final sensor locations.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注海洋碳汇对新增观测数据的敏感性。它评估了SOCATv2024数据集中新增数据对海气二氧化碳通量重建的影响，发现2018年后，基于SOCATv2024的重建结果显示海洋碳吸收量显著低于基于SOCATv2023的结果。差异主要源于南大洋新增的63个航次的数据。虽然这些数据有望提高重建的准确性，但也表明海气二氧化碳通量重建对数据稀疏区域的新增数据高度敏感。该研究主要关注海洋碳循环，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关系不大。
topic_words: ['Ocean carbon sink', 'Air-sea CO2 flux', 'Southern Ocean', 'Carbon uptake']
authors: Amanda R. Fay;Thea H. Heimdal;Viviana Acquaviva;Abby P. Shaum;Galen A. McKinley
title: Sensitivity of Ocean Carbon Sink Estimates to Rare Observations
abstract: We evaluate the impact of new data in the annual release of SOCATv2024 on air‐sea carbon dioxide (CO2) flux reconstructions. Using the pCO2‐Residual and LDEO‐HPD methods, we reconstruct surface ocean fCO2 based on SOCATv2023 and SOCATv2024. For both products we find strong agreement in global mean air‐sea CO2 fluxes for 1990–2017, but a notable divergence beginning in 2018. Reconstructions based on SOCATv2024 estimate substantially less ocean carbon uptake compared to those based on SOCATv2023, with a global mean difference of 0.25–0.27 PgCyr−1 over 2018–2022. We find that flux differences are due primarily to large changes in the Southern Ocean where data from 63 cruises was added for SOCATv2024. Analysis with a model‐testbed indicates that these data, if unbiased, should substantially increase reconstruction fidelity. We conclude that there is high sensitivity of air‐sea CO2 flux reconstructions to the addition of data in poorly‐sampled regions.

explanation: 这篇论文主要研究的是2012年尼科亚Mw 7.6级地震后，浅层慢滑事件（SSEs）复发率暂时性增加的现象。论文探讨了地震后滑动对浅层慢滑事件的影响，并使用库仑应力模型来解释这种现象。研究重点在于地震地质和构造，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Guoli Li;Surui Xie;Marino Protti;Cyril Muller
title: Temporarily Increased Recurrence Rate of Shallow Slow Slip Events Driven by Significant Afterslip Following the 2012 Mw 7.6 Nicoya Earthquake
abstract: Slow slip events (SSEs) release tectonic strain without causing sudden ground shaking. SSEs have been observed at many subduction zones, some dynamically triggered by stress changes due to the passage of seismic waves. However, there are limited observations of SSEs induced by post‐seismic deformation. Here, we report a significant increase in the recurrence rate of SSEs in the shallow portion of the Nicoya megathrust following the 2012 Mw 7.6 earthquake. These shallow SSEs occurred immediately updip of the large afterslip zone and their recurrence rate returned to pre‐earthquake level 1.5 years after the earthquake. In contrast, deeper SSE recurrence rate remained unchanged. Coulomb Failure Stress modeling indicates the shallow SSE area experienced substantial stress perturbation during afterslip, while the deeper megathrust did not. We interpret this temporarily increased shallow SSE recurrence rate to be driven by static stress loading from large afterslip.

explanation: 该论文主要研究土壤水分优先流的普遍性和原因，通过分析美国17个生态区域的高频多深度土壤湿度数据，发现优先流广泛存在，并受降雨强度、土壤质地、土壤湿度变异性、气候和净初级生产力等因素影响。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，主要关注水文和土壤过程。
authors: Bonan Li;Matthias Sprenger;Briana M. Wyatt;Daniel Giménez;Daniel R. Hirmas;Hoori Ajami;Inge Wiekenkamp;Jannis Groh;John R. Nimmo;Matthew T. Amato;Nitin K. Singh;Octavia Crompton;Ryoko Araki;Tianfang Xu;Pamela L. Sullivan
title: Ubiquity and Causes of Soil Water Preferential Flow Across 17 Ecoregions
abstract: Preferential flow (PF) in soil causes the rapid transport of water, nutrients, and contaminants into the subsurface, influencing groundwater recharge and streamflow. Data scarcity has hindered the quantification of PF occurrence and the identification of its drivers across diverse ecoregions. We address this gap by analyzing high‐frequency, multi‐depth soil moisture data across 17 ecoregions in the USA, using ∼1,500 sensors at 40 sites. We discovered that PF is widespread, with sites experiencing PF in up to 60% of rainfall events ≥2 mm. Multiple approaches consistently show that PF is more likely to occur with increased peak rainfall intensity, finer textured material, low soil moisture variability, humid climate, and higher net primary productivity. This suggests that PF patterns could shift with projected climate changes, increasing uncertainty in predictions of groundwater recharge, water quality, and streamflow generation.

explanation: 这篇论文主要研究加利福尼亚洋流系统中涡流对初级生产力的影响。它探讨了中尺度过程（如涡流、锋面和丝状结构）如何调节营养物质的输送和初级生产，并利用卫星和模型数据分析了涡流动能与叶绿素浓度之间的关系。研究结果表明，涡流对不同区域的初级生产力有不同的影响，近岸区域可能降低硝酸盐和生物生产，而离岸区域则可能增加硝酸盐和生物生产。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，主要关注海洋生态系统。
authors: Dou Li;Xiaozhou Ruan;Anh Le‐Duy Pham;Pierre Damien;Daniele Bianchi
title: Role of Eddies in Primary Production in the California Current System
abstract: Mesoscale‐induced processes such as eddies, fronts, and filaments are believed to play a key role in regulating nutrient transport and primary production in the California Current System (CCS), though their precise influence remains debated. Using satellite and model results, we show a weak negative correlation between surface eddy kinetic energy (EKE) and chlorophyll concentration nearshore, and a significant positive correlation offshore. EKE‐based composite analysis of phytoplankton carbon and nitrate NO3 $\left(\mathrm{N}{\mathrm{O}}_{\mathrm{3}}\right)$ budgets highlights the spatial variability of eddy impacts. In the nearshore band (0–100 km), eddy‐induced horizontal advection reduces NO3 $\mathrm{N}{\mathrm{O}}_{\mathrm{3}}$ and biological production. In the 100–300 km band, eddy‐induced horizontal advection and vertical mixing increase NO3 $\mathrm{N}{\mathrm{O}}_{\mathrm{3}}$ in the surface mixed layer, boosting local productivity. Beyond 300 km, horizontal eddy advection directly exports phytoplankton offshore, increasing its local concentrations. These results clarify how mesoscale processes modulate primary production across different regions of the CCS and offer critical insight into potential ecosystem responses to future climate change.

explanation: 该论文主要研究实验室条件下正极性雷电先导的重新激活现象，重点在于放电过程中的光学观测、电压和电流同步测量。论文揭示了衰减的先导前端会形成独立的发光结构，从而导致先导步进，并伴随电流脉冲。这种现象有助于理解自然雷电中的类似过程。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Dianhang Li;Weijiang Chen;Shengxin Huang;Bo Qi;Nianwen Xiang;Zhong Fu;Yufei Fu;Zimeng Zheng
title: The Reactivation of Decayed Positive Leader With Sudden Channel Elongation in Laboratory Long Spark
abstract: Positive lightning leaders present reactivation behaviors during their propagation processes. The mechanism underlying the reactivation of positive leaders is yet unclear. Using the synchronous measurement of optical observation, discharge voltage, and current, a novel phenomenon related to the reactivation of positive leaders is reported in laboratory. It is disclosed that separate luminous structures, which lead to positive leader steps, can form ahead of decayed leaders. The single positive leader branch can be reactivated by a separate luminous structure accompanied by a steep‐rising current pulse superimposed on zero background current. When positive leaders show decayed branches during their development, separate luminous structures can reactivate decayed branches and result in alternating and competitive development among branches. This process is accompanied by a sudden elongation in length. The reactivation scenario reported here in laboratory helps to interpret that in natural lightning.

explanation: 该论文主要关注的是美国国家航空航天局（NASA）和美国地质调查局（USGS）的Landsat Next任务中的图像压缩策略，旨在开发一种近乎无损的图像压缩方法。虽然Landsat数据可以用于大气环境遥感，例如气溶胶监测，但该论文的核心在于数据处理和存储技术，而不是直接的大气成分分析或空气质量监测。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['Image Compression', 'Remote Sensing', 'Landsat Next', 'Data Management', 'Satellite Imagery']
authors: Rehman S. Eon;Craig De Groot;Jeffrey A. Pedelty;Aaron Gerace;Matthew Montanaro;Richard K. Covington;Amy S. DeLisa;Wen-Ting Hsieh;Joy M. Henegar-leon;Douglas J. Daniels;Christopher Engebretson;Christopher J. Crawford;Thomas R.H. Holmes;Philip Dabney;Bruce D. Cook
title: Corrigendum to Toward a near-lossless image compression strategy for the NASA/USGS Landsat Next mission Remote Sensing of Environment Volume 329, 1 November 2025, 114929

explanation: 由于只提供了标题“编委会”和摘要“摘要”，没有提供任何关于研究内容的信息，因此无法判断该论文是否与大气环境遥感技术相关。无法提取主题词，也无法对论文内容进行解释。
title: Editorial Board

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文提出了一种新的时空引导混合学习模型（STGHL），用于精确绘制地表空气相对湿度（RH）的空间分布图。虽然论文没有直接提及空气质量监测或大气成分分析等传统的大气环境遥感技术，但相对湿度是气候变化和环境研究中的一个关键参数，与大气环境密切相关。该模型利用机器学习方法，结合地面观测数据，生成高精度的相对湿度地图，这对于理解和预测气候变化、公共健康以及环境变化具有重要意义。虽然它没有明确使用卫星观测数据，但其方法可以扩展到整合遥感数据，从而增强大气环境遥感技术的应用。
topic_words: ['relative humidity', 'spatiotemporal analysis', 'machine learning', 'spatial mapping', 'climate change', 'environmental conservation', 'ground-based observations']
authors: Fengrui Chen;Xi Li;Yiguo Wang;Shaoqi Pan
title: A spatiotemporal-guided hybrid learning model for mapping surface air relative humidity
abstract:
•A novel spatiotemporal-guided hybrid learning model (STGHL) for RH mapping is proposed. •STGHL establishes a hybrid top-down and bottom-up learning paradigm. •STGHL integrates spatiotemporal principles into deep learning architectures. •STGHL greatly improves model accuracy and generalization in mapping daily RH across China. 
 Accurately mapping the spatial distribution of surface air relative humidity (RH) is critically important for diverse fields including climate change, public health, and environmental conservation. Although machine learning has exhibited considerable advantages in RH mapping, factors such as its inherent bottom-up learning strategy, the unique spatiotemporal characteristics of geographical phenomena, and the scarcity of ground-based observations limit model performance. To address these limitations, this study proposes a novel spatiotemporal-guided hybrid learning (STGHL) model for precise RH mapping. The model establishes a hybrid learning paradigm that integrates principles of spatiotemporal autocorrelation and heterogeneity into deep learning architectures. The paradigm organically combines top-down guided learning with bottom-up spontaneous learning through the design of three specialized guided learning modules, which collectively enable neural networks to deeply represent the complex spatiotemporal patterns of RH. We conducted a comprehensive evaluation of the STGHL model by generating daily RH maps across the Chinese mainland during the period 2014–2018. The rigorous 10-fold spatial cross-validation results show that the STGHL model achieves exceptional performance, with an R2 of 0.92, a mean absolute error (MAE) of 3.93%, and a root mean square error (RMSE) of 5.24%. Compared with state-of-the-art machine learning-based mapping models, the proposed model demonstrates significant improvements in accuracy, generalization capability, and explainability, reducing MAE and RMSE by at least 13% and 14%, respectively. This study contributes to the field by establishing a novel spatiotemporal-guided hybrid learning paradigm that offering new insights and approaches for geospatial phenomena mapping, while promoting the profound integration of machine learning and geoscience disciplines.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注的是使用InVEST模型和地理加权回归（GTWR）模型来研究中国山区氮（N）和磷（P）输出的驱动因素，并分析这些驱动因素如何随空间尺度变化。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究侧重于水文过程和陆地生态系统服务，而非大气环境。
authors: Zhiqiang Lin;Shuangyun Peng;Yuanyuan Yin;Dongling Ma;Rong Jin;Jiaying Zhu;Ziyi Zhu;Shuangfu Shi;Yilin Zhu
title: Corrigendum to “Coupled InVEST-GTWR modeling reveals scale-dependent drivers of N and P export in a Chinese mountainous region” [Int. J. Appl. Earth Obs. Geoinf. 142 (2025) 104705]

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它探讨了2021年SIJAQ活动期间首尔城市地区在寒冷季节发生的细颗粒物污染事件。研究重点是测量黑碳颗粒上发生的非均相反应的证据。虽然标题没有明确提及遥感技术，但对细颗粒物、城市空气质量和大气成分的关注表明该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。例如，卫星观测和地面监测站可以用来监测细颗粒物的浓度和分布，而大气成分分析可以帮助识别和量化黑碳颗粒和其他污染物。SIJAQ活动本身可能涉及使用遥感技术来研究大气过程。
topic_words: ['fine aerosol', 'urban air quality', 'cold season pollution', 'heterogeneous reactions', 'black carbon particles', 'SIJAQ campaign']
authors: Saehee Lim;Min-Suk Bae;Jihi Jang;Anubhav Kumar Dwivedi;Junsu Gil;Joo ae Kim;Meehye Lee;Sea-Ho Oh;Sun-A Shin;Lim-Seok Chang
title: Corrigendum to “Exploring fine-aerosol episodes in urban Seoul during the cold season of the 2021 SIJAQ campaign: Measurement evidences of heterogeneous reactions on black carbon particles” [Atmospheric Environ. 342 (2025) 1-12 120926]

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它关注的是华北平原严重雾霾事件的模拟，并比较了多种化学机制。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为雾霾事件的监测、空气质量评估和大气成分分析是遥感技术的重要应用领域。该研究通过比较不同的化学机制，旨在提高对雾霾形成过程的理解和预测能力，从而为空气质量管理和遥感监测提供科学依据。
topic_words: ['air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition', 'haze event', 'chemical mechanisms']
authors: Zhen Li;Yicong He;Shaocai Yu;Hongkui Wang;Fan Fan;Chuang Qin;Ye Chen;Weiwei Dai;Zixi Jin;Dongliang Zhao
title: Intercomparison of multiple chemical mechanisms in simulating severe haze event over the North China plain

explanation: 该研究评估了CMIP6模型在模拟快速衰减厄尔尼诺事件对哈德莱环流影响方面的能力。它侧重于气候模型对厄尔尼诺现象及其对大气环流影响的模拟，特别是海表温度异常和区域气候变化。虽然与大气过程有关，但它不直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析，而是侧重于气候模型的性能评估。
topic_words: ['El Niño', 'Hadley Circulation', 'Climate Modeling', 'Sea Surface Temperature', 'Indo-Pacific Warm Pool']
authors: Tongfei Zhang;Juan Feng;Falei Xu;Shuang Wang;Xuanliang Ji
title: Evaluation of CMIP6 models in simulating the impact of rapid decay El Niño events on the Hadley Circulation
abstract:
•Rapid decay El Niño events induce stronger Hadley circulation anomalies than slow ones. •27 CMIP6 models are evaluated for their ability to simulate RD El Niño–HC relationships. •Type I models better capture observed asymmetric HC anomalies during RD El Niño events. •Type II models underestimate HC anomalies due to cold SST biases over the IPWP. •IPWP SST distribution is the main factor limiting HC simulation in Type II models. 
 Different decaying rates of El Niño events display significant distinct impacts on the Hadley circulation (HC), and the influences of rapid decay (RD) El Niño events on the HC is much greater than that of slow decay events. However, it remains unclear whether state-of-the-art models can adequately capture the HC anomalies associated with RD El Niño events. This study evaluates 27 Coupled Model Intercomparison Project 6 models of their ability to reproduce the HC anomalies during RD El Niño events. Based on the performance of spatial characteristics of the simulated HC anomalies during RD El Niño events, the models are categorized into Type I (with better performance) and Type II (with less satisfactory performance), and the physical causes underlying their performance differences are examined. Type I models reasonably capture the observed HC anomalies associated with RD events, while Type II models underestimate HC anomalies and exhibit evident structural deviations. By comparing sea surface temperature anomalies (SSTA) and circulation anomalies across different regions, we find that Type II models exhibit cold SSTA biases in the Indo-Pacific Warm Pool (IPWP), which lead to reversed meridional SST gradients compared to observations and cause evident deviations in the spatial structure of HC anomalies. These results identify the anomalous SST distribution in the IPWP during RD El Niño events as an important factor limiting the performance of Type II models in reproducing RD El Niño events-related HC variations, and provide a reference for improving the simulation of tropical air–sea interactions during RD El Niño events.

explanation: 该研究论文主要探讨了2015年至2022年间，北京-天津-河北（BTH）地区平流层臭氧入侵事件的特征和识别。研究使用欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）的大气成分再分析数据（EAC4），通过统计分析和后向轨迹分析，识别平流层臭氧入侵事件，并探讨其垂直传输模式。研究发现，BTH地区的西北部是对这类入侵最敏感的区域。该研究定义了平流层臭氧倾斜入侵事件，并分析了这些事件对BTH地区春季对流层臭氧的显著影响。总的来说，这项研究对于理解平流层臭氧入侵，以及识别BTH地区地面臭氧污染的自然来源至关重要，与大气环境遥感技术，如大气成分分析和空气质量监测密切相关。
topic_words: ['stratospheric ozone intrusion', 'tropospheric ozone', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'air quality monitoring', 'ECMWF EAC4 dataset']
authors: Xinyue Wang;Xuewei Hou;Tianliang Zhao;Yuqing Zhang;Alok Pandey;Yuxiang Jin
title: Characteristics and identification of stratospheric ozone slanted intrusion into the troposphere in the BTH region
abstract:
•Stratosphere to the northwest of the BTH region as a key source of slanted ozone intrusions impacting the BTH region. •Slanted intrusions peak in May, contributing significantly to tropospheric ozone in BTH during spring. •Trajectory analysis confirms the pathway, highlights faster ozone descent at high altitudes and slower near surface. 
 This study investigates the occurrence and characteristics of stratospheric ozone (O3) intrusion events in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei (BTH) region, from 2015 to 2022, using the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) Atmospheric Composition Reanalysis 4 (EAC4) dataset. Through statistical analysis and backward trajectory analyses, the study identifies stratospheric O3 intrusion events and explores their vertical transmission patterns. Results show that the northwest of the BTH region, between 108°E–118°E and 45°N–50°N, is most sensitive to such intrusions. The study defines stratospheric O3 slanted intrusion events using three parameters: tropopause pressure change, vertical velocity, and O3 concentration change. These events lasted 43 days in the study period, with a peak in spring—May alone accounting for 33 % of all intrusions. During these events, stratospheric O3 significantly exceeds average levels in the lower troposphere. A detailed analysis of a typical event on June 17, 2015, shows that the westerly jet stream in the mid-latitudes drives the downward tropopause shift toward the BTH region, resulting in rapid horizontal transport of O3-rich air masses at high altitudes. The stratospheric O3 contribution increased at the 600 hPa level as the wind speed decreased with altitude. After about 30 h, the invading air mass reached the lower troposphere in northwest BTH. Vertical transmission is also evident, with significant tropopause descent and faster O3 transport from sensitive northwest areas. This study enhances the understanding of stratospheric O3 intrusions, which is crucial for identifying natural sources of ground-level O3 pollution in the BTH region.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注的是北冰洋巴伦支海海冰变化与欧亚大陆地表气温之间的关系，特别是这种关系在2000年前后发生的年代际变化。研究发现，巴伦支海海冰密集度的空间分布模式变化导致了海冰与欧亚大陆气温联系的减弱。虽然海冰变化会影响大气环流，但该研究并没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Yuan Yuan;Huixin Li;Bo Sun;Fei Li;Shengping He
title: Interdecadal variation in the relationship between November Barents Sea Ice and the subsequent March Eurasian surface air temperature
abstract:
•The linkage between March Eurasian SAT and previous November Barents Sea SIC has weakened around the 2000s. •The interdecadal change is attributed to the different distribution patterns of Barents Sea SIC driven by its variability. •Barents Sea SIC anomalies enhanced eastward wave train to cause dipole Eurasian SAT before 2000, which weakened after 2000. 
 Changes in Arctic sea ice concentration (SIC) significantly affect mid- to low-latitude climates, yet research regarding its effect on Eurasian climate change in early spring remains insufficient. Based on reanalysis datasets and model simulations, this study reveals a significant weakening in the relationship between the dipole pattern with opposite SIC anomalies in the northern (76°–82°N, 20°–50°E) and southern (70°–76°N, 47°–67°E) regions over the Barents Sea during late autumn and the dipole mode of surface air temperature (SAT) with opposite anomalies in the southern (15°–45°N, 35°–100°E) and northern (50°–75°N, 15°–180°E) regions over Eurasia during early spring around the 2000s. This change is attributed to different spatial patterns of SIC interannual anomalies in two subperiods. During Period 1 (1978/1979–1999/2000), the dipole SIC anomalous pattern may persist from November toward the following March, which modulates the SAT in situ by affecting turbulent heat flux and longwave radiation, which further strengthening eastward-propagating wave trains originating from the North Atlantic and inducing the dipole SAT pattern in Eurasia in the following March. In contrast, during Period 2 (2000/2001–2021/2022), consistent interannual SIC anomalies over the Barents Sea in late autumn weakened this relationship due to less pronounced wave trains propagating from the Barents Sea to Eurasia. The findings of this paper reveal that different patterns of Arctic SIC can lead to varying characteristics in the Eurasian climate, suggesting the complex relationship between Arctic and Eurasian climates.

explanation: 该研究主要关注台湾夏季雷暴单体的特征，利用雷暴单体识别和追踪算法（SCIT）产生的追踪误差统计数据。目的是了解雷暴单体的统计特征，并开发基于雷暴的临近预报技术，以提高预警能力。研究分析了2011年至2018年5月至8月期间来自五分山和赤古的雷达数据，根据天气系统将统计数据分为天气系统日和弱天气系统日，并使用不同的雷达分析了台湾北部和南部的特征。该研究开发了两种临近预报技术：雷暴潜在追踪区域（PTAS）和雷暴追踪概率（PoST），旨在辅助预报员可视化追踪预报的误差区域，并量化雷暴单体威胁的每个区域的概率值。这些产品可以快速更新雷达扫描，为决策者提供及时有效的预警信息，以提高严重天气事件期间的公共安全。该研究侧重于雷暴天气预报和追踪，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联不大。
topic_words: ['storm cells', 'nowcasting', 'radar data', 'tracking error', 'severe weather events']
authors: Kao-Shen Chung;Tsai-Jung Lee;Li-Pen Wang;Bing-Zhang Wang;Chieh-Ying Ke;Yi-Hao Tsou;Shin-Gan Chen;Ping-Yu Lin;Treng-Shi Huang
title: Statistical characteristics of storm cells and centroid-based probability nowcasts by tracking error
abstract:
•Analyse the distribution of storm cells features for different regions and weather systems. •The warning products are constructed by utilising historical tracking error information. •Through statistical analysis, storm-based nowcast techniques for risk assessment and decision-making are established. 
 This study investigated the characteristics of summer storm cells over Taiwan, focusing on the tracking error statistics generated by the Storm Cell Identification and Tracking algorithm (SCIT). The primary objective is to understand the quantitative details of the currently lacking statistical features of storm cells and develop storm-based nowcasting techniques to improve early warning capability. Radar data from Wu-Fen Shan and Chi-Gu, collected from May to August over 8 years (2011–2018), were analysed. The study classified the statistics into synoptic and weak synoptic days to examine the influence of prevailing weather systems, and also analysed the characteristics of northern and southern Taiwan using different radars. The durations of summer storm cells detected by the SCIT algorithm in Taiwan mostly are within an hour. The main differences in statistical features under different conditions depend on the distribution location of storm cells. Complex terrain significantly contributes to storm cell deceleration. Storm cells exhibit larger tracking errors when detected by radars with longer scanning intervals or under conditions of higher movement speeds. Based on error statistics from different groups, two nowcasting techniques: the Potential Track Area for Storm (PTAS) and the Probability of Storm Tracking (PoST), were developed. PTAS assists forecasters in visualizing error regions for tracking forecasts, maintaining a 0.7 Probability of Detection (POD) score in 1 h forecasts, especially effective during typhoon circulations. PoST, complementary to PTAS, quantifies the probability values of each region threatened by storm cells. These products can be quickly updated with radar scans during real-time application, providing decision-makers with effective and timely warning information to enhance public safety during severe weather events.

explanation: 该研究论文评估了NASA MPLNET雨水掩蔽算法（RMA）在戈达德太空飞行中心和巴塞罗那站点的性能，并探讨了其与EarthCARE云廓线雷达验证的相关性。虽然该研究没有直接涉及空气质量监测或大气成分分析，但它通过提高全球降水监测的准确性，间接支持了气候模型的改进。该研究验证了RMA算法在检测降水方面的有效性，并将其与IMERG数据进行了比较，强调了其在支持ESA-JAXA EarthCARE任务卫星降水数据验证方面的潜力。因此，这项研究与大气环境遥感技术相关，因为它关注卫星观测数据的验证和改进，从而有助于更准确地理解水文循环和气候变化。
topic_words: ['precipitation detection', 'satellite data validation', 'EarthCARE mission', 'MPLNET', 'IMERG', 'hydrological cycle', 'climate models']
authors: Simone Lolli;Jasper R. Lewis;Ali Tokay;Gemine Vivone;James R. Campbell;Erica K. Dolinar;Michael Sïcard;Adolfo Comerón;Alejandro Rodriguez-Gomez;Constantino Muñoz-Porcar;Albert García-Benadí;Mireia Udina;Joan Bech;Ellsworth J. Welton
title: Evaluating the NASA MPLNET Rain Masking Algorithm at Goddard Space Flight Center and Barcelona sites: Relevance to EarthCARE Cloud Profiling Radar Validation
abstract:
•RMA detects precipitation and virga with 72% accuracy, outperforming IMERG in sensitivity. •RMA validated at GSFC (USA) and UPC (Spain) with consistent precipitation detection. •RMA exceeds IMERG in sensitivity and balance, while IMERG leads in specificity and precision. •RMA supports ESA-JAXA EarthCARE radar validation, improving global precipitation monitoring. 
 Accurate detection of precipitation on a global scale is essential for advancing our understanding of the hydrological cycle and improving climate models. This study evaluates the performance of the Rain Masking Algorithm (RMA), developed for NASA’s Micropulse Lidar Network (MPLNET), in detecting rainfall events and distinguishing them from non-rain events over multiple years. The RMA’s effectiveness was validated against data from co-located disdrometers at two distinct MPLNET sites: the Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC) in the United States and Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya (UPC) in Barcelona, Spain. Comparisons were also conducted with precipitation retrievals from the Integrated Multi-Satellite Retrievals for GPM (IMERG) project. Results indicate that the RMA is highly effective at detecting rain events, outperforming IMERG in sensitivity and accuracy at both sites, and demonstrating also unique capability in distinguishing virga, precipitation that evaporated before reaching the ground (not considered in the intercomparison). However, the algorithm shows limitations in identifying low-intensity precipitation and occasionally records false positives due to transient atmospheric artifacts. These results underscore the potential of the RMA in advancing the validation of satellite precipitation data from the ground, which is advantageous for the upcoming ESA-JAXA EarthCARE mission. Although the current analysis does not include EarthCARE data, we present the performance of RMA and a corresponding matchup strategy that are intended to facilitate next validation efforts for EarthCARE’s precipitation data. This work also highlights the RMA as a promising tool for refining global precipitation monitoring and advancing meteorological and climate forecasting accuracy.

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要表明，它与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。论文主要研究如何利用地面气象站数据、卫星数据以及二者的结合，使用XGBoost机器学习方法进行能见度预测。能见度是空气质量的重要指标，因此该研究与空气质量监测直接相关。卫星数据的使用也表明了其与遥感技术的关联。
topic_words: ['visibility forecast', 'station data', 'satellite data', 'XGBoost', 'air quality']
authors: Michaela Schütz;Adrian Schütz;Jörg Bendix;Jonas Müller und Boris Thies
title: Evaluating station, satellite, & combined data for XGBoost-based visibility forecast

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注三维收缩电子技术在自由曲面上的应用，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究似乎侧重于电子工程和材料科学领域，而不是环境科学或大气物理学。
authors: Yangbo Yuan;Dongliang Chen;Jianyu Li;Bowen Li;Abu Musa Abdullah;Fatema Tuz Zohra;Wanqing Zhang;Xianzhe Zhang;Xin Xin;Mohammad Ali Amidian;Ankan Dutta;Feifei Shi;Huanyu Cheng
title: Three-dimensional shrinking electronics on freestanding and freeform curvilinear surfaces

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注食物网结构在连接生物多样性与多维稳定性中的中介作用，并以全球海洋生态系统为例进行研究。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关系。该论文主要探讨生态学和生物多样性，而非大气科学或遥感技术。
authors: Jianfeng Feng;Xuhao Wan;Ruyue Wang;Shengpeng Li;Maohong Wei;Vasilis Dakos;Marcos Llope;Xueqiang Lu;Nils Chr. Stenseth
title: Mediating role of food web structure in linking diversity to multidimensional stability: Evidence from global marine ecosystems

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注一种名为 Euplotes vannus 的生物体内的 Soma 来源的 30 个核苷酸的小 RNA，以及它们与染色体断裂和精确靶向非转座子 DNA 以进行消除的关系。 这项研究属于分子生物学和遗传学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Liping Lyu;Bijia Ding;Jinyu Fu;Iwona Rzeszutek;Estienne C. Swart;Mariusz Nowacki;Feng Gao
title: Soma-derived 30-nt small RNAs are coupled with chromosome breakage and precisely target nontransposon DNA against elimination in Euplotes vannus

explanation: 该研究主要关注大气中水团簇催化形成的硝基芳香族化合物，探讨其作为二次气溶胶来源的可能性。虽然涉及到大气成分和空气质量，但重点在于化学反应机制和气溶胶的生成过程，而非遥感技术或卫星观测，因此与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['secondary aerosol', 'nitroaromatics', 'atmospheric water cluster', 'air quality']
authors: Haiping Xiong;Xiaoyu Liu;Chongwen Sun;Xiangyu Zhang;Xinming Wang;Jingxin Lin;Likun Xue;Xiaomin Sun;Xiaona Shang;Fangfang Ma;Hongbin Xie;Jingwen Chen;Gang Yan;Jiangbin Shu;Hongbo Fu;Lin Wang;Yinon Rudich;Christian George;Abdelwahid Mellouki;Defeng Zhao;Xinke Wang;Hartmut Herrmann;Jianmin Chen
title: Atmospheric water cluster–catalyzed formation of nitroaromatics as a secondary aerosol source

title: Ligand-receptor interactions induce and mediate regulatory functions of BATF3+ B cells

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注B细胞外囊泡如何影响黑色素瘤对免疫检查点疗法的反应。 这属于生物医学研究领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。 因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术不相关。

title: B cell extracellular vesicles influence melanoma response to immune checkpoint therapy

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注细胞生物学领域，特别是内源性p21水平在保护基因组稳定性方面的作用，以及它如何通过抑制过量和受限的新生DNA合成来实现这一目标。 这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Nicolás L. Calzetta;Sabrina F. Mansilla;Candelaria Mares Ahlers;Agostina P. Bertolin;Lilen I. Caimi;Sofía Venerus Arbilla;Jingkun Zeng;Lisa Wiesmüller;Vanesa Gottifredi
title: Endogenous p21 levels protect genomic stability by suppressing both excess and restrained nascent DNA syntheses

explanation: 该论文主要研究的是一种受脊柱启发的刚度可重编程磁流变超材料，用于多位视觉机械信息处理。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关系。该研究专注于材料科学和机械信息处理领域。
authors: Congcong Lou;Xinyu Lian;Huaxia Deng;Bing Liu;Shilong Duan;Yunpu Zhao;Xinglong Gong
title: Stiffness reprogrammable magnetorheological metamaterials inspired by spine for multibit visual mechanical information processing

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是基于二维材料中声学电荷传输的模拟信号处理平台。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该论文似乎侧重于材料科学、声学和信号处理领域，而不是大气科学或环境科学。
authors: Yueyi Sun;Siming Liu;Jiefei Zhu;Dexing Liu;Jiwei Chen;Yingjie Luo;Yihong Sun;Min Zhang;Mansun Chan;Cary Y. Yang;Changjian Zhou
title: Comprehensive analog signal processing platform enabled by acoustic charge transport in two-dimensional materials

explanation: 该研究主要关注惰性气体与金属有机框架（MOFs）之间的相互作用，利用129Xe和83Kr核磁共振（NMR）光谱技术进行研究。虽然MOFs材料在气体吸附和分离方面有潜在应用，可能间接与空气质量监测相关，但该研究的核心在于材料科学和光谱分析，而非直接针对大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Wanli Zhang;Vinicius Martins;Jeffrey Collins;Reza Moshrefi;Samantha Michelle Gateman;Victor V. Terskikh;Yining Huang
title: Interplay between noble gases and MOFs: Insights from 129Xe and 83Kr NMR spectroscopy

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注锂硫电池催化阴极上的转化过程的原位研究。 这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。 该研究似乎集中在电化学和材料科学领域，旨在提高锂硫电池的性能。
authors: Yuan Li;Jian-Xin Tian;Xu-Sheng Zhang;Rui-Zhi Liu;Zhen-Zhen Shen;Hao-Nan Li;Shuang-Yan Lang;Rui Wen
title: In situ unveiling the conversion processes on the catalytic cathode in lithium-sulfur batteries

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注等离子体激元和混合纳米材料的能量转移途径。虽然纳米材料在环境传感中可能有一些应用，但该标题和摘要并未明确提及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较低。

title: Plasmonic pathway to hybrid nanomaterials through energy transfer

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注量子力学领域，特别是量子机器和热力学第二定律。它探讨了量子系统中的相关性以及它们如何影响热力学定律。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Milton Aguilar and Eric Lutz
title: Correlated quantum machines beyond the standard second law

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注量子范德波尔振荡器的实验实现和同步。这是一个量子物理学领域的研究，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。
authors: Yi Li;Zihan Xie;Xiaodong Yang;Yue Li;Xingyu Zhao;Xu Cheng;Xinhua Peng;Jun Li;Eric Lutz;Yiheng Lin;Jiangfeng Du
title: Experimental realization and synchronization of a quantum van der Pol oscillator

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注基因组范围内的CRISPR筛选，以识别在驱动肝细胞癌中起作用的剪接因子SF3B4。 这项研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。 它属于生物学和医学领域，特别是癌症研究和基因组学。
authors: Yue Guo;Mingjing Xu;Hua Xue;Xiaofan Ding;Alissa M. Wong;Na Lin;Dandan Pu;Aikha M. Wong;Xin Wang;Hui Zhao;Nathalie Wong
title: Genome-wide CRISPR screen identifies splicing factor SF3B4 in driving hepatocellular carcinoma

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注凝聚态物理学领域，特别是金材料中Rashba自旋轨道耦合的涌现现象。它探讨了在具有纳米尺度界面网络的块状金中出现的这种物理现象。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术领域无关。
authors: Shreya Kumbhakar;Banashree Debnath;Tuhin Kumar Maji;Binita Tongbram;Shinjan Mandal;T. Phanindra Sai;T. V. Ramakrishnan;Manish Jain;H. R. Krishnamurthy;Anshu Pandey;Arindam Ghosh
title: Emergent Rashba spin-orbit coupling in bulk gold with buried network of nanoscale interfaces

explanation:
根据提供的标题和摘要，该研究似乎主要关注的是数字孪生技术在放射敏感有机物种三维空间分布中的应用。虽然“有机物种”可能在一定程度上与大气环境相关（例如，大气中的有机污染物），但重点在于放射敏感性和三维空间分布的模拟，而非大气环境遥感技术的应用，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。

该研究更可能涉及的是生物学、化学或医学领域，利用数字孪生技术来模拟和研究放射性物质对有机物种的影响，以及它们在三维空间中的分布情况。这可能与环境科学中的放射性污染研究有关，但与大气遥感技术的关联不大。
authors: Laure Cazals;Agnès Desolneux;Simo Huotari;Lauren Dalecky;Christoph Sahle;Alessandro Mirone;Serge X. Cohen;Loïc Bertrand
title: Digital twin enables radiosensitive organic speciation in 3D
